issue.title: When BlockHound is installed, do not report GlobalEventExecutor/Singl‚Ä¶

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
‚Ä¶eThreadEventExecutor#takeTask as blocking call.

Motivation:

GlobalEventExecutor/SingleThreadEventExecutor#taskQueue is BlockingQueue.

Modifications:

Add allowBlockingCallsInside configuration for GlobalEventExecutor/SingleThreadEventExecutor#takeTask.

Result:

Fixes #9984
When BlockHound is installed, GlobalEventExecutor/SingleThreadEventExecutor#takeTask is not reported as a blocking call.
